Class Background2

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Background2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Background2
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class receives the image for the backgound Handles the animations of the cards
    Author:
    Michelle M Ortiz & Mario Orbegoso
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
